news.title: New Gentoo Foundation Trustee Board Members

body.p: Congratulations (and good luck!) to the Gentoo Foundation's newly-elected Trustees for 2005-2006. Turnout was quite good (45% of the nearly 200 Foundation members voted), and the Foundation's first member-wide vote appears to have been almost entirely problem-free. Thanks to Aron Griffis for writing the "votify" and "countify" voting software, and to Aron, Mike Vapier, and Tom Martin for presiding over this election. Detailed election analysis of this Condorcet election may be found in this post to the gentoo-nfp mailing list.
